All Implemented Interfaces:
GeneralDAO, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class GeneralDAOImpl
extends HibernateDAOHQLImpl
implements GeneralDAO

Implementation of GeneralDAO using SpringHibernateSupport and HQL for searches.

Author:
dwolverton
